title: Learn how to automate everyday tasks with these $30 ChatGPT and automation courses
content:
Macworld

Many of us have tried ChatGPT since it launched in 2022. But if you want to harness ChatGPT and other AI tools more effectively in the workforce, you may want to consider learning from this ChatGPT and automation course pack.

Offering 25 hours of courses and 12 lectures, this $30 bundle could help you leverage AI power with daily tasks, whether you work in business, marketing, or programming. Learning such skills could make you a more valuable job candidate and allow you to innovate more efficiently.

Through hands-on lessons, you can discover how to automate various tasks in your professional and personal life using ChatGPT. Learn to streamline business operations through automation, which can enhance efficiency and optimize resource usage. Users can also learn how to use AI to analyze and visualize data, write better code, tailor ChatGPT to meet specific field demands, gain practical automation knowledge to apply to real-world scenarios, and much more.

All the content comes from Eduonix, a leading provider of technical courses with a solid 4-star rating on Trustpilot. Your purchase will net you lifetime access to these courses, available on both desktop and mobile devices, plus a certificate of completion.

Harness the power of ChatGPT and AI to get ahead of your tasks.

Grab this ChatGPT and Automation course pack for just $29.99 for a limited time.
